name: The Birkhill Group, LLC
overview:
The Birkhill Group is a private integrated investment bank and management consulting firm serving startup, emerging, early operational and growth stage private and public companies. Birkhill provides a level of financial advisory expertise and client service typically found only in regional and money center investment banks. It is highly selective in the engagements it undertakes, seeking to build long term, trusted advisory relationships with its clients rather than simply doing ad hoc transactions.

For over thirty years Birkhill’s principals have advised and invested their own capital in or raised third party debt and equity for both large and small enterprises. Its clients include entrepreneurs seeking angel or seed money, early stage or seasoned operating companies looking for expansion capital or to recapitalize, small public companies seeking to gain visibility and trading volume, and management teams preparing for liquidity events.

Birkhill’s sector expertise includes:

Healthcare - devices, diagnostics, services, delivery and insurance; Financial Services - banking, commercial finance, asset-based lending, factoring and consumer credit; Life Sciences - biotech and pharma; Technology - telecomm and datacomm, instruments, satellite and ERP systems; Internet Commerce - community buying and reverse auction businesses; Aerospace, Defense & Intelligence - classified systems, commercial and military aircraft, security; Energy - traditional and alternative, including biodiesel, shale, tar sands, deep gas, refining, exploration and production, secondary and tertiary recovery and petrochemicals; Cleantech - recycling technologies, sustainable and renewable technologies and projects; Real Estate - REOC’s, construction technology and single project development.
